original_title: 声を出せない私11 暴虐の校内凌辱 希島あいり
overview: Mika, who has begun her career as a teacher, has had a busy but fulfilling life. At that time, on the rooftop where I was called for consultation, my student suddenly kissed me, and my senior teacher showed me a voyeur photo of the kissing scene as if to chase after him.
title: I can't make a sound. Ryo in the school of violence
